title: Mystara
description: A vast realm where magic flows through every living thing.
history: Founded millennia ago by the Ancient Ones, Mystara has been the stage for countless epic tales.
geography: Spanning three continents and countless islands, Mystara features diverse landscapes from frozen tundras to scorching deserts.

title: The Shadow Realm
description: A parallel dimension where darkness reigns supreme.
history: The Shadow Realm exists beyond the veil of reality, a place few mortals dare to tread.
geography: An ever-shifting landscape of shadow and nightmare, where the laws of physics bend and break.
